name: Venture Giant
tag_list: tech-entrepreneurs, private-investors, dragons-den, investment, investors, tech-investors
overview:
Venture Giant is an online platform where savvy tech entrepreneurs can submit their investment proposals to private investors. An alternative to Google Investment fund - but for the UK!

Venture Giant connects savvy tech entrepreneurs that are looking for funding for their tech start-ups with Private Investors that are actively looking to invest into these entrepreneurs and businesses.

The total pool of investment available to savvy tech start-ups is Â£250m (and growing daily).

We have all watched the hugely successful BBC television show The Dragons’ Den and many of us either feel the pain of how difficult it is for these innovative entrepreneurs to get the hard to find capital for their business ideas or, aspire to be like the successful dragons on the show and want to be able to access these exciting start-up companies.

Venture Giant was created to bridge this gap. Investors can view and browse investment proposals from entrepreneurs in all investment fields including technology and social media - and entrepreneurs can now access these investors in a friendly - easy to use environment.

Venture Giant has recently been nominated “Best investment network award” by Angel Investor News.

external_links.title: Rated #1 angel investment network by Angel Investor News
